Multiple social media users shared a vid: claiming that Air India charged three times the usual fare and did not follow social distancing norms.
Facebook user Praveen Kumar Prabhakar po: highlighting the absence of an empty seat between passengers, which has been shared over 400 times.
Indian National Congress member Sumit Ya: but did not specifically mention it was an Air India flight.
Alt News conducted a fact: check and discovered that the video was originally uploaded by The Citizen Of Pakistan, claiming it was a Pakistan International Airlines (PIA) flight. Alt News also found a news report from GNN, a Pakistan-based news channel, confirming the incident on a flight from Toronto to Islamabad.
